name: Sloth Escape
description:
Aliens are poaching Sloths from Earth and players must save them. Sloths don’t like to move, so players must move the Ship instead and roll the Sloth. Players will need to avoid obstacles that will kill them along the way, solve puzzles and more. Players win by bringing the Sloth to the exit safely
